title: Cauliflower Puree Recipe for babies - Cauliflower mash for Babies
content:
Healthy cauliflower puree which is very nutritious for your baby. It has lots of vitamins in them which makes it even more healthy.

Cauliflower is packed full of phytochemicals which are said to help prevent cancer. Just one cup of cauliflower is packed with Vitamin A, Vitamin C, and even calcium. Cauliflower is a great addition to a healthy diet but it causes many people to be a bit gassy.

Cauliflower is a little gassy vegetable, so you have to introduce it to babies after 8 months.

Cauliflower Puree for babies - Cauliflower Mash for Babies

 

Prep time

5 mins

 

Cook time

5 mins

 

Total time

10 mins

 

Recipe type: Baby Food

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 1 cup

 

Ingredients

Cauliflower florets - 1 cup

Water - ¼ cup

 

Instructions

Take clean cauliflower in a saucepan. Add a splash of water and cook covered till tender.

Take it in a blender and puree till smooth.

Pour this in a bowl and feed your baby.

 

Notes

1)You can introduce this to your baby after 8 months.

2)You can add a pinch of salt to your puree for better taste.

recommendations.title: Healthy Vegetable Stir Fry Recipe for Kids and Toddlers
recommendations.content: This is a great dish to include veggies in your little one's diet. You can add whatever veggies you like in this. The addition of nuts powder in this makes it more tasty and healthy for your kids. You can serve this with rice or use it as a filling in paratha or use it as a filling for roti rolls

recommendations.title: Beetroot milk Recipe, Rose milk using Beetroots
recommendations.content:
Delicious rose milk made using beetroots. This is healthy for kids and toddlers. Instead of giving normal rose milk with lots of food coloring, you can give this beet milk.
